personal.summary: I am an educator passionate about giving students an opportunity to explore the field of Computer Science. I have completed the Udacity Blockchain Developer Nanodegree and the Udacity Machine Learning Engineer Nanodegree.

details: Taught Computer Science in classrooms up to 30 high school students.
Developed the Introduction to Programming and Code Lab Curriculum taught at Brockton High School
Certified to teach Project Lead the Way Computer Science Essentials.
Managed content on the Brockton Public Schools website, ensuring content was ADA compliant.
Developed and maintained the Brockton Public Schools website, Staff Intranet, Student Intranet, and newsletter.
Collaborated with the Director of Communications in developing new features for the website.
Covered events and wrote articles about the great things Brockton students are doing throughout the year.
Trained instructors and guidance counselors learning the new Office 365 system.
Activated and distributed Sprint devices for the Sprint 1 Million Project.
Assisted the Dean and Assistant Dean with daily activities including classroom coverage, discipline, and hall/cafeteria duties.
Created a safe learning environment for students by developing relationships centered on trust.
Member of the Isenberg Business and Law Club

certifications.name: Certified Machine Learning Engineer
certifications.summary: Learn advanced machine learning techniques and algorithms and how to package and deploy your models to a production environment. Gain practical experience using Amazon SageMaker to deploy trained models to a web application and evaluate the performance of your models. A/B test models and learn how to update the models as you gather more data, an important skill in industry.

certifications.name: Certified Blockchain Developer
certifications.summary: Learn the fundamentals of the blockchain platform. Create your own private blockchain, and secure a digital asset using blockchain identity. Explore the Ethereum platform, and use Solidity and smart contracts to develop your own decentralized app.

certifications.name: Javascript Algorithms and Data Structures
certifications.summary: Time to put your newly learnt skills to work! By working on projects you would have the opportunity of applying all the skills, principles and concepts you have learnt so far HTML, CSS, Visual Design, Accessibility, etc.

certifications.name: Responsive Web Design
certifications.summary: JavaScript is a high-level programming language that all modern web browsers support. It is also one of the core technologies of the web, along with HTML and CSS that you may have learned previously. This section will cover basic JavaScript programming concepts, which range from variables and arithmetic to objects and loops.
